ygData.messageBody:
The faction hit mentioned was from the rangers...
=)

--- "Nygaardr, FC3" <nygaardr@...>
wrote:
> Ummmm, What faction hit? I never got a faction
> hit for a hill giant or a
> Cyclops before. Although its been a while
> since I have hunted there.
>
> Mu
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Sinarya L'achesis

> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Where to be lvl 31

>
> A couple other great spots for that level are
> the
> rangers (if you can take the faction hit) in EC
> or WC or a cyclops/hill giant group in the
> Rathe
> Mountains (both of which con red to me at this
> level). I'm just starting to group at these 2
> spots, but I've seen other players up to level
> 40
> fighting these mobs and both are good for loot
> and xp!! They drop plat & fine steel weapons
> and
> at both areas there are vendors to sell to. =)
>
> Kinrea Keres
> 26th DE Warrior
